survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the experiences and challenges of urban bicycle commuters to improve cycling infrastructure and safety.

questions.question_text: How often do you commute by bicycle in an urban area?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you commute by bicycle in an urban area?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose to commute by bicycle? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Faster than other modes of transport
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include 'Other' with an open-text option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose to commute by bicycle? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Faster than other modes of transport
